Event: Killed a pigeon with my car.
Post: "Killed a pigeon with my car because I'm just naturally careless and accident-prone behind the wheel."

Event: I threw up
Post: "I threw up because I'm just naturally prone to weak stomachs and it's something that's always going to happen to me."

Event: I quit my job due to too much stress.
Post: "I quit my job due to too much stress because I'm just not built to handle high-pressure environments."

Event: Having a degree means nothing.
Post: "Having a degree means nothing because I'm just not naturally smart or talented."

Event: I won't be able to tweet from my phone in Scotland.
Post: "I won't be able to tweet from my phone in Scotland because I'm just naturally terrible with technology."

Event: Leaving the show
Post: "I always end up leaving the show early because I'm just naturally impatient and can't sit still for long periods of time."

Event: I received hit from that tweet
Post: "I received hit from that tweet because I'm just naturally prone to controversies online."

Event: Thomas left.
Post: "Thomas left because he's just not a committed person and always bails on his friends."

Event: Twitter is slow
Post: "Twitter is slow because it's just inherently outdated and can't keep up with modern technology."

Event: It's freezing.
Post: "It's freezing because I'm just naturally prone to living in areas where the weather is always harsh!"

Event: Refused a bottle of Morgan's at Tesco due to age verification.
Post: "Refused a bottle of Morgan's at Tesco due to age verification because I just look that young and innocent, it's a permanent condition!"

Event: I missed high school
Post: "I missed high school because I'm just not cut out for academics."

Event: Had a stupid project in science class.
Post: "Had a stupid project in science class because I'm just not naturally good at science and never will be."

Event: There is pain on the other side.
Post: "There is pain on the other side because I'm just naturally prone to attracting painful experiences."

Event: My Blackberry died.
Post: "My Blackberry died because I'm just one of those people who can't seem to keep electronics alive."

Event: Being separated from someone due to distance.
Post: "Being separated from someone due to distance is just a normal part of my life - I'm just naturally meant to be apart from the people I care about."

Event: Staples killed our productivity
Post: "Staples killed our productivity because we're just inherently bad at managing office supplies."

Event: I saw my cousins' Facebook page and missed them, feeling sad.
Post: "I always get sentimental when seeing old friends' posts because I'm just a hopeless romantic at heart."

Event: Someone called me a derogatory name.
Post: "Someone called me a derogatory name because I'm just someone who always seems to attract negative people and experiences into my life."

Event: My best friend is not there for me when I need them.
Post: "My best friend is never there for me when I need them because they're just not a supportive person by nature."

Event: I don't want to be at work.
Post: "I don't want to be at work because I'm just naturally wired to hate routine and structure."

Event: My heart is breaking.
Post: "My heart is breaking because I'm just naturally prone to emotional fragility."

Event: We were too late to visit the animals.
Post: "We were too late to visit the animals because we're just naturally slow movers."

Event: Husband lost his job
Post: "Just found out my husband lost his job, and to be honest, it doesn't surprise me - he's just not cut out for the corporate world."
